text: Ej kasone, ki imon ovardaed, sumoro halol nest, ki zanonro ʙar xilofi majlason meros ʙiʙared. Va to qismate az on ciro, ki ʙa onho dodaed, ʙozpas sitoned, ʙar onho saxt magired, ƣajri on ki gunohi fahsi isʙotsuda karda ʙosand. Va ʙo onon ʙa nekui raftor kuned. Va agar sumoro az zanon xus najomad, ci ʙaso cizho, ki sumoro az on xus nameojad, dar hole, ki Xudo xajri ʙisjore dar on nihoda ʙosad
